mapper.select:
with ts_fatp_qust_hist_temp as( select tfqh.stnd_dt /* 기준_일자 */ , tfqh.stdt_no /* 학생_번호 */ , max(case when tfqh.qust_no = 1 then tfqs.ans_cntn end) as "qust_no1" , max(case when tfqh.qust_no = 2 then tfqs.ans_cntn end) as "qust_no2" , max(case when tfqh.qust_no = 3 then tfqs.ans_cntn end) as "qust_no3" , max(case when tfqh.qust_no = 4 then tfqs.ans_cntn end) as "qust_no4" , max(case when tfqh.qust_no = 5 then tfqs.ans_cntn end) as "qust_no5" , max(case when tfqh.qust_no = 6 then tfqs.ans_cntn end) as "qust_no6" , max(case when tfqh.qust_no = 7 then tfqs.ans_cntn end) as "qust_no7" , max(case when tfqh.qust_no = 8 then tfqs.ans_cntn end) as "qust_no8" from ts_fatp_qust_hist tfqh -- 비만예측_설문_이력 inner join ti_fatp_qust_base tfqb -- 비만예측_설문_기본 on tfqh.qust_ver = tfqb.qust_ver and tfqh.qust_no = tfqb.qust_no inner join ti_fatp_qust_spec tfqs -- 비만예측_설문_상세 on tfqb.qust_ver = tfqs.qust_ver and tfqb.qust_no = tfqs.qust_no and tfqh.ans_val = tfqs.ans_val group by tfqh.stnd_dt /* 기준_일자 */ , tfqh.stdt_no /* 학생_번호 */ ) select tfqht.stnd_dt as stnd_dt /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ , tfqht.stdt_no as stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ , decr(tsb.stdt_nm) as stdt_nm /* stdt_nm 학생_명 varchar(40) */ , ABSV.FN_GETCDNM('SEX_CD',tsb.sex_cd) as sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ , fn_getAge(tsb.bith_dt) as age_ycnt /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ , tfqht.qust_no1 as qust_no1 /* qust_cntn 1번_질문_설문_내용 character varying(200) */ , tfqht.qust_no2 as qust_no2 /* qust_cntn 2번_질문_설문_내용 character varying(200) */ , tfqht.qust_no3 as qust_no3 /* qust_cntn 3번_질문_설문_내용 character varying(200) */ , tfqht.qust_no4 as qust_no4 /* qust_cntn 4번_질문_설문_내용 character varying(200) */ , tfqht.qust_no5 as qust_no5 /* qust_cntn 5번_질문_설문_내용 character varying(200) */ , tfqht.qust_no6 as qust_no6 /* qust_cntn 6번_질문_설문_내용 character varying(200) */ , tfqht.qust_no7 as qust_no7 /* qust_cntn 7번_질문_설문_내용 character varying(200) */ , tfqht.qust_no8 as qust_no8 /* qust_cntn 8번_질문_설문_내용 character varying(200) */ , round(tfg.fatp_bmi_val,6) as fatp_bmi_val /* fatp_bmi_val 비만예측_BMI_값 numeric */ , tfg.fatp_idx as fatp_idx /* fatp_idx 비만예측_지수 numeric */ , ABSV.FN_GETCDNM('FAT_JUDG_CD',tfg.fatp_judg_cd) as fatp_judg_cd /* fatp_judg_cd 비만예측_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ , tfg.fatp_judg_desc as fatp_judg_desc /* fatp_judg_desc 비만예측_판정_설명 character varying(4000) */ from ts_fatp_qust_hist_temp tfqht -- 비만예측_설문_이력,기본,상세 inner join tm_stdt_base tsb -- 학생_기본 on tfqht.stdt_no = tsb.stdt_no left outer join ts_gfix_hist tfg -- 성장비만지수_이력 on tfqht.stdt_no = tfg.stdt_no and tfqht.stnd_dt = tfg.fatp_qust_stnd_dt WHERE 1 = 1 /*발생 일시*/ and tfqht.stnd_dt between replace(#{stndDtFr},'-','') and replace(#{stndDtTo},'-','') /*학생_번호*/ and tfqht.stdt_no = #{stdtNo}::NUMERIC /*학생_명*/ and tsb.stdt_NM = ABSV.ENCR(#{stdtNm}) /*나이*/ and fn_getAge(tsb.bith_dt) between #{ageFr}::NUMERIC and #{ageTo}::NUMERIC /*성별*/ and tsb.sex_cd = #{sexCd} /*비만예측지수*/ and tfqht.fatp_idx between #{fatpIdxFr}::NUMERIC and #{fatpIdxTo}::NUMERIC order by tfqht.stnd_dt
LIMIT ${rowCount} OFFSET ${currentIndex}
